Package hep.aida.ref.remote.interfaces

Interface Summary
AidaTreeClient Basic interface for AIDA Tree Client.
AidaTreeServant Basic interface for AIDA Tree Servant.
AidaTreeServer Main AIDA Tree Server - manages connect/disconnect of AidaTreeClients and life cycle of AidaTreeServants.
AidaUpdatable Interface that is used by the Queue to process updates on a separate thread.
AidaUpdateEvent Is passed to the TreeClient to notify it about changes in the server-side ITree.
ITable
